tasks.command: (echo rst 0 && echo loadfile ${command:cfs.selectProgramFile} && echo r && echo q) | "${command:cfs.jlink.setJlinkPath}/JLink.exe" -device ${command:cfs.jlink.setDevice} -if SWD -speed 4000 -autoconnect 1 -NoGui 1 -ExitOnError 1
